mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.fudaoyuan_name as fudaoyuanName ,a.fudaoyuan_phone as fudaoyuanPhone ,a.fudaoyuan_id_number as fudaoyuanIdNumber ,a.fudaoyuan_photo as fudaoyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.fudaoyuan_email as fudaoyuanEmail ,a.banji_types as banjiTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM fudaoyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.fudaoyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.fudaoyuanName},'%')
and a.fudaoyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.fudaoyuanPhone},'%')
and a.fudaoyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.fudaoyuanIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.fudaoyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.fudaoyuanEmail},'%')
and a.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
